member.name: T:Skybrud.Umbraco.GridData.Howdy
member.summary: Internal class referencing stuff from Umbraco 7.3, which isn't available in Umbraco 7.2. Since only this class is referencing code in Umbraco 7.3, we can make a release that works for both Umbraco 7.2.x and 7.3.x.

member.name: T:Skybrud.Umbraco.GridData.PiggyBank
member.summary:
This project started out as a proof of concept for and with my colleague Ren Pjengaard. While I couldn't think of a proper name at the time, the name of this class was mostly to annoy Ren.
The class has now been replaced by the class, but this class is left behind for good memories. It is however not recommended to use this class.
